backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing payment entries and party master records with create, import, list, and lookup functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-to-file mapping report listing frontend code involved in export, print, filtering, and sorting features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and design tokens plus dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout with tab navigation for entry, entries, and report views.
frontend/src/features/partyPayments/dueT: Utility functions for checking if a payment is due today and formatting phone numbers.
frontend/src/features/partyPayments/part: Parses Excel files to import party master data, mapping columns and handling warnings and errors.
Manages saving and loading party master records in localStorage with helper lookup utilities.
frontend/src/features/partyPayments/Part: Searchable popover combobox for selecting or typing party names with auto-select behavior.
Entries table with search, due-today filter, sorting, and CSV export; loads entries via React Query.
Form component for creating party payment entries with location capture, validation, and Excel import of party masters.
Displays party payment history with filtering and supports PDF, CSV, and print export options.
frontend/src/features/partyPayments/part: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on payment entries and party masters, including serialization logic.
frontend/src/features/partyPayments/repo: Exports payment entry data to a CSV file with proper escaping and formatting.
Generates a PDF payment report using jsPDF and autotable loaded dynamically from CDN.
frontend/src/features/partyPayments/type: Type definitions for party payment forms, entries, and master records.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, dark mode colors, and print-specific styling rules.
frontend/src/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration stub for jspdf.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/xlsx.d.ts: TypeScript declarations for the xlsx module including workbook, worksheet, utils, and read/write functions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, features, requirements, and planned functionality.
